title: Fall of the Elves
description: The elves are dead. If she can’t figure out why, the humans are next…Countess Tessa of Newshire is bored. Trapped in a marriage of convenience and obligation, she spends her days evading the eyes of a kingdom and immersing herself in stories of the fallen elven race. Until the day she stumbles across the last dragon in the forest behind her estate and is tasked with saving the humans from the same fate of the elves.Soon, her repeated dreams of the dead elf queen become too vivid to ignore, showing there might have been more behind the disappearance of the mythic race than the stories say. But when rumours stir of the inhuman forces that slaughtered the elves marching on the Four Kingdoms, Tessa vows to ensure the horrific past doesn’t repeat itself. She is reluctantly pulled into a world of magic and monsters, and her dreams seem to be the catalyst to the end.Can Tessa figure out the mystery behind the fall of the elves before her own people succumb to the same fate?Fall of the Elves is the first book in the magical Elves of Asarton YA fantasy trilogy.If you love fantastical lands and age-old wars, then you’ll love Alexis Samson’s thrilling adventure.
author: Alexis Samson
